excerpt: A sweet and savory Asian-inspired dish that is both healthy and delicious!

instructions.name: Prepare Tempeh
instructions: Spread cornstarch on tempeh strips until coated.
Heat oil in a pan on medium-high heat.
Add tempeh strips and stir-fry until browned and crispy, about 3-5 minutes. Set aside.

instructions.name: Prepare Teriyaki Sauce
instructions: In a small saucepan, combine soy sauce, water, brown sugar, garlic, and ginger.
Heat on medium heat until sugar dissolves, about 2-3 minutes.
Add cornstarch mixture and stir until thickened, about 1-2 minutes. Set aside.

instructions.name: Stir-fry Vegetables
instructions: Heat oil in a pan on medium-high heat.
Add sliced bell pepper and onion. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.

instructions.name: Combine Ingredients
instructions: Add tempeh strips and teriyaki sauce to the pan with the vegetables.
Stir-fry until everything is coated with sauce and heated through, about 1-2 minutes.
Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions before serving.
